text: Mage rahuna janare loka, allahace rasula (sallallahu alaihi vasallama) yancyavirud'dha apalya basuna rahanyavara khusa aheta. Tyanni allahacya margata apalya dhanane va pranane jihada karane apriya janale ani te mhanale ki ya bhayankara unhata nighu naka. Tyanna sanga ki jahannamaci aga yahuna atisaya tapadayaka ahe. Yanni he samajuna ghetale asela tara bare jhale asate
